thread.title: Trump condemns Syria attack, vows quick action

title: Trump condemns Syria attack, vows quick action
text:
Trump condemns Syria attack, vows quick action Monday, April 09, 2018 - 02:34 
U.S. President Donald Trump promised quick action on Monday in response to a “barbaric” suspected chemical weapons attack in Syria and made clear that all options including military action were on the table. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump promised quick action on Monday in response to a “barbaric” suspected chemical weapons attack in Syria and made clear that all options including military action were on the table.
